title: Lol people actually think Element dragon is a cool idea
body:
RNG is already ruining this game hard enough, you get random crits and random teammates, guess what, now you get random objectives!
Bullshit I'm done with this game.

replies.body:
ITT, people not garanteeing a snowballing off of first drag isn't a good idea.

RNG is not inherently bad. It all depends on what said random thing is and how it interacts with the game.
This makes it to where there is more thought on picking upo drags beyond just getting them all.

Now it makes it less snowbally since the buffs are randomize instead of set in a fixed order, meaning more thought goes into getting drags beyond "we need to get drags or the other team will"

Now you have have to keep in mind what you are doing drag for and whether you are okay with the enemy getting it, whereas the choice before was always, "no". and getting 1 drag always snowballed the team that got it ad made contesting following drags almost impossible.
It **IS** a cool idea. Whether it's good for the game or not is quite a different question, one that I'm not prepared to answer yet.

i agree with Vendemiaire. the elemental dragons  are not a bad idea the randomness is the worst idea to competitive level the randomness can snowball (and what i think about this is that riot has hes own impact. like when Nashor randomly attack Bjergsen i think that wasn't  random. riot actually have control over those things and i think they favor some teams over others this is fucking illegal. that's why they introduce the elemental dragons for more impact to help their team) to casual level that has lower impact. just take a second and think about it
